title: Super Alien Hero Buddy Adventures
description: Who will protect us from the nefarious deeds of the League of Evil Doom Fiends? The forces of good and fairness unite to form the Super Alien Hero Buddies!
quote: Time to get unstuck and turn up the heat!
creator: Tim Dean
altHero: Handy Buddy, Fiery Buddy, and Doggy Buddy
alt2: Handy Buddy flexing his multiple arms
alt4: Evil Doom Friends in a trash can
